translations: n.低音；浅色；小声；潜在的含意

phrs.translation: 低音, 薄层色, 低声
小声说中文, 小声的说中文, 中国基调发言, 低声说中国

sentences.sentence: "What d'you think?" she asked in an undertone.
His soft words contained an undertone of warning.
sentences.translation: 他温和的话中蕴涵着警告之意。

sentences.sentence: He added in an undertone to the Queen, "Really, my dear, YOU must cross-examine the next witness."
sentences.translation: 他又低声对王后说：“真的，亲爱的，下一个证人必须你来盘问了。”
